scripts.dev: supervisor -w src -e ts,json -n error  -x npx -- ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.dev-local: SERVER_URL=ws://localhost:8888 supervisor -w src -e ts,json -n error  -x npx -- ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.dev-docker: SERVER_URL=ws://ichibot.trade.local:8888 supervisor -w src -e ts,json -n error  -x npx -- ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.dev-test: SERVER_URL=wss://test.ichibot.trade:443 supervisor -w src -e ts,json -n error  -x npx -- ts-node src/index.ts
